name: DeansList
headline: Enterprise SaaS software helping schools manage administrative andâ¦
description: DeansList is a new gradebook that helps schools assess critical âsoft skillsâ like perseverance, diligence, leadership, teamwork and grit. With DeansList, schools capture data on classroom behavior and disciplinary interventions, and use that data to define metrics and goals for student improvement. They also benefit from powerful analytics enabling them to see behavior trends emerge and constantly improve school culture.

[Services](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</services>)[Resources](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</resources>)[Support](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</support>)[Schedule a Demo](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</schedule-a-demo>)
# Modern tools to help‍schools run smoothly.
[Deans:A Day Using DeansList](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</schedule-a-demo>)
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</schedule-a-demo>)
[District & CMO Leaders](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</schedule-a-demo>)
## ‍DeansList streamlines schools' day-to-day ops so everything works the way you need it to.
![Family Engagement](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c8e540b38c07d1e40a4c968_ico-family.png)
## Family Engagement & Communication
Tools to build strong, **positive** relationships with every family, regardless of language barriers or availability.
Send emails, text messages and phone calls, parent and student apps, call logs, electronic report distribution and e-signing - all automatically translated.
[Learn More](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</solutions/family-engagement>)
![Behavior](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/607087cb25e51210f7abaa42_cubes_65_65.png)
## Classroom Behavior & School Culture
All the tools you need to track behavior and build positive school culture for your students _and_ your staff. Implement positive interventions like [PBIS](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</features/pbis>), restorative justice practices, and build a schoolwide system that motivates students to be their best everyday.
Social-emotional learning (SEL), PBIS & MTSS, track behaviors, merits/demerits, core values, weekly reports, paychecks, etc.
[Learn More](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</solutions/behavior-and-school-culture>)
![Attendance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c8e5424e1e60365bfbab6ce_ico-att.png)
## Attendance &Absenteeism
Reducing absenteeism requires a multi-pronged approach involving administrators, teachers, students and families. DeansList gives you the tools to identify students who need help and to design interventions that make sure students arrive _on-time_ , **everyday.**
Take daily/class attendance, notify parents with phone calls emails and text, messages, send home absence letters, and more.
[Learn More](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</solutions/attendance>)
![RTI & MTSS](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/60db773a768945466bd298c5_ico-ladder-70.png)
## RTI & MTSS‍
Seamlessly manage RTI (Response-to-Intervention) / MTSS (Multi-Tiered Student Supports) plans. From problem identification through each meeting, goal and intervention, our tools make it easier for teachers to support students.
Document meetings, assign students to tiers, set goals and interventions, monitor and update student progress
![Data Analysis](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c8e54442f2b676553ba94d7_ico-data.png)
## Office Referrals & Incidents
DeansList streamlines the entire referral process so students can get back to class quickly. From the moment an issue emerges, through all related conversations, everything is documented in one place and everyone involved is kept up-to-speed.
Text alerts, consequences, incident letters, restorative practices, suspension reduction and compliance.
[Learn More](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</solutions/referrals-incidents>)
![Reports](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/60dbd561545654a6d8a3a9c0_ico-reports.png)
## Student Reports & Report Cards
Create custom reports for students and families to review or reflect on. Include all data from DeansList + import any data from your files or other systems. Print and distribute, email home or post them to Student and Family app accounts.
No more mail merges! Generate Weekly Reports, Progress Reports, Report Cards, Student One-Pagers, and more with one click. 
[See More Solutions](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</features-old>)
## Education Technology: We focus on the tech, you focus on the educationGreat technology has the power to transform the way a school operates, but educators shouldn't have to spend time wrestling with software or manipulating data. That's why our software works the way your school needs it to.
## Great Schools Use DeansList
![Lawrence Public Schools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5e87491b08c71e62fa4e0718_lps.png)![KIPP Public Schools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/61702e20fff39b4827982cfa_kipp.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/6526b114a7bff4a8cd72c841_lead.png)![Springfield Public Schools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/61702cb407d2042f0af90014_sps.png)![Ednovate](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c337c1258125d71aa3f5f8d_ednovate.png)
![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c33e6b2cb94284a93f18a43_arrow-grad.png)
## What Sets DeansList Apart: Collecting data is just the start - it's about putting it to work in ways that inform every stakeholder in a student's education.
![Positive Incentives](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c32d6a4121342ca3f0427b4_incentives.png)
## Rewards and Interventions‍Motivate students and track interventions
Keep track of rewards and consequences all in one place, making it easy to celebrate accomplishments and hold students accountable.
![Notifications](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c91331b3663b978bd668a6a_notifications.png)
## Alerts and Updates‍Keep everyone up-to-speed
DeansList makes sure that every member of your school community (teachers, administrators, students and families) are all _proactively_ informed about what's going on. Whether it's a text message about an incident in the cafeteria or a positive congrats for perfect attendance this month, DeansList takes care of it.
![Data Analysis](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/6070807c3a0f95727e382f00_analytics.jpg)
## Powerful Analytics‍Info at your fingertips.
From the quick info teachers only have 2 seconds to look at (_where's a student who should be in my class?_), to in-depth trends and reports (_what core values do we need to work on?_), DeansList puts the data you need to see front-and-center.
## More than just software. We provide technical and operational support every step of the way to ensure your school succeeds.
[Learn More About How DeansList Supports Schools](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</services>)
### See it in action
## Schedule Your Demo Today‍It only takes a few minutes to see how DeansList can help transform the way your school uses technology.
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</schedule-a-demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c2e71bc910be6390e0847ed/5c2e72528385a9a262bf039c_DL-Text-Logo-150.png)](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com/</>)

generated_description:
**DeansList: Transforming Educational Administration**

DeansList is a New York-based startup that's shaking up how schools manage their administrative tasks. Initially conceived as an innovative gradebook, DeansList focuses on assessing critical soft skills—like perseverance, leadership, and teamwork—in addition to standard academic metrics. With the rise of educational technology, DeansList has pivoted to become a comprehensive Enterprise SaaS solution designed to streamline school operations and improve student outcomes.

### The Mission
DeansList aims to help schools harness the power of data to foster student improvement and enhance school culture. They provide tools for tracking classroom behavior, managing disciplinary actions, and visualizing trends over time through powerful analytics. Essentially, it’s about turning data into actionable insights that guide educators and bolster student success.

### Key Features
1. **Behavior & Culture Management**: DeansList equips schools with tools to track student behavior and promote a positive school culture. This includes implementing interventions like Positive Behavioral Interventions and Supports (PBIS) and restorative justice practices.

2. **Family Engagement**: They believe strong communication with families is crucial. Their platform allows schools to send automated messages—whether emails or texts—that can be translated into different languages, ensuring all families stay informed.

3. **Attendance & Absenteeism Solutions**: By taking a holistic approach, DeansList helps identify students who may need additional support to ensure they arrive on time, every day.

4. **Referral Management & Incident Tracking**: The platform simplifies the referral process for behavioral incidents to help students quickly return to the classroom, while documenting everything in one centralized system.

5. **Powerful Reporting Tools**: DeansList allows for the easy generation of custom reports on student performance, helping to keep families involved in their child's education without the hassle of traditional mail merges.

### Company Highlights
- **Founded**: In the current unspecified year, DeansList is a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch IK12, indicating its commitment to education-focused innovation.
- **Team Size**: A focused team of 11 professionals is driving the mission forward, showcasing the startup's belief in efficiency and purpose over sheer size.
- **Promotions**: DeansList is currently offering a Pre-Thanksgiving promotion, giving schools the chance to save 25% off the first two years if they sign up before November 25th.

For education administrators looking for a modern solution to age-old problems, the DeansList platform stands out as a capable ally. From capturing critical data to facilitating communication and enhancing school culture, it's designed to empower schools to run more smoothly and effectively.

To learn more about their offerings or to schedule a demo, visit [DeansList](http://www.deanslistsoftware.com). 

In an era where education is as much about social-emotional learning as academic achievement, DeansList is set to play an important role in shaping the future of educational administration.
